metadata.inclusion:
To manually include the device, press Tamper three times repeatedly to perform the actions.
LED Status:Blue LED solid light
metadata.exclusion:
To manually exclude the device, press Tamper three times repeatedly to perform the actions.
LED Status:Blue LED 1 sec. flashes 3 times
metadata.reset:
The Device Reset Locally Notification Command is used to advertise that the device will be reset to default.
In Wake up time, Press tamp key 2 times, then the third long press 5s, then device will clear the data back to the factory default.
Please use this procedure only when the network primary controller is missing or otherwise inoperable.
